zh.title: 教皇约翰·保罗二世首次访问爱尔兰
美国发现号航天飞机成功发射
海湾战争爆发前夕，多国部队集结
巴西总统费尔南多·科洛尔遭弹劾
波音787梦想飞机首次亮相
萨摩亚海啸造成重大人员伤亡
中国（上海）自由贸易试验区正式成立
美国宣布对朝鲜实施新的制裁

en.title: Pope John Paul II visited Ireland, a historic event.
Space Shuttle Discovery launched, resuming US space flights.
The Soviet Union recognized the Republic of Korea.
Fernando Collor de Mello impeached as President of Brazil.
O.J. Simpson was acquitted on murder charges.
Gol Transportes Aéreos Flight 1907 crashed in Brazil.
Pittsburgh Penguins goalie Michel-Maxime "Max" Talbot became the first player in Penguins' history to score two goals in Game 7 of a Stanley Cup final.
Government shutdown in the United States began.
Azerbaijan launched a military offensive in Nagorno-Karabakh.
